title: principles of political economy (illustrated)
content: the book has an active table of contents for easy access to each chapter of principles of political economy by john mill.the work, principles of political economy by john mill, was one of the most widely read of all books on economics in the world as adam smith's wealth of nations. mill's principles of political economy dominated economics teaching and the book was the standard text in oxford university. john mill is known as one of the founders of economics. this is a must-read book for people who are interested in the deepest thoughts about the core economic subjects by john mill, one of the greatest thinkers on the planet.
